entry.title: Re 5/ Scalara announces March rebalancing results for the DeFi Pulse Index.
entry.summary: Re 5/ Scalara announces March rebalancing results for the DeFi Pulse Index. Scalara: Scalara announces the results of the March 2022 rebalance of the DeFi Pulse Index ($DPI). Monthly top performers were 3 constituents that have been index members since inception: - @KyberNetwork KNC +79% - @loopringorg LRC +61% - @synthetix_io SNX +46% https://www.scalara.xyz/blog/march-2022-rebalance-defi-pulse-index

entry.title: Re 3/ 🗞️Related Market News🗞️ Gemini makes DPI available on their mobile app
entry.summary: Re 3/ 🗞️Related Market News🗞️ Gemini makes DPI available on their mobile app DeFi Pulse 🍇: 🥳 DeFi Pulse Index ($DPI) x @Gemini We are very happy to announce that $DPI is now listed on #Gemini! What does this mean? 🧵👇

entry.title: Re 2/ $DPI is a token based on the DeFi Pulse Index, a digital asset index designed to track the performance of some of the largest protocols in DeFi....
entry.summary: Re 2/ $DPI is a token based on the DeFi Pulse Index, a digital asset index designed to track the performance of some of the largest protocols in DeFi. $NFTI is based on The Scalara NFT Index, an index designed to track the performance of some of the most well-known #NFT collections

entry.summary: 1/ Welcome to the #sectorPulse, your weekly recap on the crypto market! 📈 $DPI is now trading at $226.4, representing a 24.8% growth during last week. 📈 $NFTI is trading at $12.98, a growth of 15.6% from March 25! The 30-day average $USDC yield on @AaveAave was 1.95%.

entry.title: Re @Gemini 3/5 Here is how trading $DPI will work 👇 1️⃣ Will open on Gemini’s API/FIX and ActiveTrader applications for USD trading pairs 2️⃣ ...
entry.summary: Re @Gemini 3/5 Here is how trading $DPI will work 👇 1️⃣ Will open on Gemini’s API/FIX and ActiveTrader applications for USD trading pairs 2️⃣ Available on Gemini’s mobile app and website on a rolling, token-by-token basis for USD, GBP, EUR, and CAD pairs

entry.title: Re @Gemini 2/5 .$DPI token has been listed on Gemini exchange today and will be available for trading on the platform soon 🙌 To deposit, click “tr...
entry.summary: Re @Gemini 2/5 .$DPI token has been listed on Gemini exchange today and will be available for trading on the platform soon 🙌 To deposit, click “transfer” then “deposit into Gemini” and pick DPI from the drop-down menu Reminder: It is only possible to deposit DPI on Ethereum’s mainnet 😉
